title: Cat Translator: What is Your Cat Thinking?

howItWorks.title: How Our Cat Translator Works
howItWorks.description: Our AI-powered cat translator analyzes your cat's facial expressions, posture, and body language to interpret their thoughts and emotions. Simply upload a photo of your cat, and we'll help you understand what they're trying to communicate.
